summary: Feature request to warn when the server-provided task start time differs significantly from when the SDK begins processing the task. This helps detect timing discrepancies that may indicate synchronization issues.
userImpact: Users would receive warnings when task processing timing differs from server expectations, helping identify timing-related issues.
resolutionDetails: Declined as too niche - not enough user demand or impact to justify implementation.
keyQuote: We're not gonna do this. Too niche.
